title: My Body Burns, Dossier Erotique D'un Notaire 1973 Evelyne Scott, Angela Hansen, Gilda Arancio, Alice Arno, Jean Luisi, Reine Thirion + Jean Marie Pallardy

sources.title: My Body Burns Dossier Erotique Dun Notaire 1973 Evelyne Scott Angela Hansen Gild
sources.description: I am sure there is a plot here somewhere, but as I don't speak French and there are no subtitles, I have no idea what is going on. Plenty of nudity and softcore sex but filmed in a style that is reminiscent of Ed Woods Jr. Really feels like the writer, director and star (all the same person, Jean-Marie Pallardy) just made up shit as he went along.
